price: 98. Ama Barril madabah tan Qarab Yallih gital yeceen maalu digaalaay doroquh sinnil heenim yakkaleeh wohuk beeta mari keenit yan, moominiiney usun balaa kee finqa siinih Qambaalan, kinnih immay finqaa kee bala keenil tadaaray, Yalli usun iyyaanam yaabbi ken niyat tanim yaaxigi kinni.
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلۡأَعۡرَابِ مَن يَتَّخِذُ مَا يُنفِقُ مَغۡرَمٗا وَيَتَرَبَّصُ بِكُمُ ٱلدَّوَآئِرَۚ عَلَيۡهِمۡ دَآئِرَةُ ٱلسَّوۡءِۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wamina al-aʿrābi man yattakhidhu mā yunfiqu maghraman wayatarabbaṣu bikumu al-dawāira ʿalayhim dāiratu al-sawi wal-lahu samīʿun ʿalīmun
